In development.

``` console
npm install twexxor-addition-calculator
```
``` javascript
const twexxorAdditionCalculator = require('twexxor-addition-calculator');
twexxorAdditionCalculator('1', 10); // '11'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('3', '4'); // '7'
twexxorAdditionCalculator(Infinity, '0'); // false
twexxorAdditionCalculator('0.000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000100', '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001000'); // '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('1e-49', '1e-49'); // '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789', '1'); // '123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456790'
twexxorAdditionCalculator(123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789, '1'); // '123456789123456780000000000000000000000000000000000001'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789.10', '1.001'); // '123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456790.101'
twexxorAdditionCalculator(1, -2); // '-1'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('-000123456.00000078900', 10.2340); // '-123445.766000789'
twexxorAdditionCalculator('-0.000000123456789123456789', '1.01010101010101010101010101010101'); // '1.01010088664422097755331201010101'
```
